job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtThe ideal candidates favorite words are learning data scale and agility You will leverage your strong collaboration skills and ability to extract valuable insights from highly complex data sets to ask the right questions and find the right answersampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtAnalyze raw data assessing quality cleansing structuring for downstream processingltligtltligtDesign accurate and scalable prediction algorithmsltligtltligtCollaborate with the engineering team to bring analytical prototypes to productionltligtltligtGenerate actionable insights for business improvementsltligtltligtDevelop company AB testing framework and test model qualityltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors degree or equivalent experience in a quantitative field Statistics Mathematics Computer Science Engineering etcltligtltligtExperience using statistical computer languages Python ampamp SLQ to manipulate data and draw insights from large data setsltligtltligt6 months of AB TestingltligtltligtExperience utilizing visualization tools to take advantage of the growing volume of available information Power BI preferredltligtltulgt
